entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 09:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
